content: उपनिक्षेपः {@--1@} The act of depositing or placing down. {@--2@} An open deposit, any article given in another's charge by letting him know its form, quantity &c. <ls>Y. 2. 25</ls>; (on which <ls>Mit.</ls> says:-- उपनिक्षेपो नाम रूपसंख्याप्रदर्शनेन रक्षणार्थं परस्य हस्ते निहितं द्रव्यं). {@--3@} A deposit sealed or covered up (?).
